select.id: select要介護認定調査督促状ByKey
select認定調査督促対象者一覧表ByKey

mapper.select: SELECT DbT7051."shichosonCode" AS shichosonCode FROM rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS DbT7051 WHERE DbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{保険者コード} LIMIT 1

SELECT DbT5910."jigyoshaMeisho" AS 宛名機関名, DbT5910."yubinNo" AS 宛名郵便番号, DbT5910."jusho" AS 宛名住所, DbT5913."chosainShimei" AS 宛名氏名 FROM rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" AS DbT5913 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" AS DbT5910 ON DbT5913."shichosonCode" = DbT5910."shichosonCode" AND DbT5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = DbT5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" WHERE DbT5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{temp_認定調査委託先コード} AND DbT5913."ninteiChosainCode" = #{temp_認定調査員コード} AND DbT5913."shichosonCode" = #{temp_市町村コード}
